title: XState - JavaScript state machines and statecharts

recommendations.comment:
When I think about building a UI like the checkout process for my workshops it's impossible to imagine doing it without xstate.

The visualizer helps me write the code w/o any significant bugs or blindspots from the start.

XState by @DavidKPiano implements some of the patterns from the industrial engineering & embedded software development community to the JavaScript world. It can also be used as a modeling tool for test automation, allowing easier refactoring.
